RandomUniformWeightInitializer¶

class RandomUniformWeightInitializer¶

Bases: bluebird.weight_initializers.WeightInitializer

Initializes random uniform values between -1 and 1.

Example:

weight_init = RandomUniformWeightInitializer()
w = weight_init.init((10, 20))
__init__()¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Initializes the weights.
